metadata.name: Fur Balls #1
metadata.description:
Lion Cubs are full of life. They always play with other youngsters and adults members of the pride, as this helps them to bond. 

Currently the Gir National Park of Gujarat is the only known habitat of the remaining Asiatic Lions in the world. 

FurBalls, the augmented reality (AR) based Edition. experience is real with AR app. App to use (Overly)

With purchase of this edition, you will get an AR image, which you can print for better experience, another high res non AR image and Video of these cubs which you see in AR.

Artist: Tapan Sheth
